name: eModulSmart
0:
”Alexa, tell eModul Smart I'm too cold.”
”Alexa, ask eModul Smart whats the temperature in the kitchen”
”Alexa, tell eModul Smart to set the temperature”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: e. modul smart
des: Allows you to control your home heating systems which are connected to an eModul account.
